about_the_game:
Game Background

I am just an ordinary, sunny and handsome young man, but unexpectedly met two charming and beautiful sisters at the corner of life - Kello and Cammy.

They are both mature, elegant and beautiful. A different kind of feeling quietly arises among the three of them... How to choose? I think this is undoubtedly a sweet adventure...

You will experience

  • Kylo and Camilla two more complete story lines

  • interaction with female character portraits,scene interaction, and Japanese dubbing of all plot dialogues!

  • Exquisite color illustrations, each scene and character has been carefully designed

  • Older female characters, two mature and charming big sisters

  • Interesting elimination game, simple and easy-to-use elimination gameplay, easily brings a pleasant gaming experience

  • Beautiful background music, accompanied by melodious background music, your story is about to begin...

Character introduction

Kello💕

Occupation: Tutor

Age: 26 years old

Body type: Well-proportioned, slightly slender

With outstanding beauty and proud figure, she has a lot of suitors

Cammy💕

Occupation: Bar DJ

Age: 25 years old

Body type: Tall and well-proportioned, curvy

Enthusiastic and teasing, but I always feel that she has something on her mind?

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content not suitable for all ages: revealing clothing, general adult content
All characters involved in sexual content are 18 years of age or older.

name: Days with girlfriends : Kello&Cammy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: By moving and matching these colorful gems, reaching 3 or more to form a straight line to eliminate them, each successful elimination will bring gorgeous special effects and satisfying sound effects, as well as beautiful illustrations unlocked after completing the level
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
